summary: About Sansa's endgame, do you think it's possible for her to be the Queen/Lady of Winterfell? Her being a Regent for Rickon...
question: About Sansa's endgame, do you think it's possible for her to be the Queen/Lady of Winterfell? Her being a Regent for Rickon would be great, but her entire arc being political makes me more inclined for her to be the sole ruler, instead of Bran or Rickon. GRRM highlighted the fact that there's never been a female ruler of Winterfell multiple times, and if the series doesn't end with a woman as Winterfell's leader (not a consort or a Regent) it would be almost disappointing
answer: Possible? Certainly. But I’m personally not keen on sacrificing Bran (to the astral plane) and Rickon to have Sansa become Lady of Winterfell. But I’m very attached to the idea that Sansa might be the Stark that holds Winterfell during the thick of the War for the Dawn, and I do think her story arc strongly supports her ruling in some capacity. Personally, I’d love nothing more than for the surviving Starklings to work as a unit post-war. Give me Bran the Rebuilder using his magical knowledge to rebuild Winterfell and the North. Give me Sansa taking on the day-to-day ruling and her ancestors’ historical duty to care and provide for her people. Give me Arya being the North’s protector and warrior. Rebuild, provide and protect. I’m in love with the idea of them being a ruling unit that embodies the very role Winterfell was built for, each with their own area of expertise to reflect their current training montages.

Give me Sansa taking on the day-to-day ruling and her ancestors’ historical duty to care and provide for her people. Give me Arya being the North’s protector and warrior. summary: HBO has released 14 photos from Season 8.   ^^^ Click the link just above to see all of them. They don’t reveal a lot....
caption:
HBO has released 14 photos from Season 8.

^^^ Click the link just above to see all of them. They don’t reveal a lot. Everybody, of course, is dressed for winter; and everybody looks rather concerned in one way or another.

The photo of Bran (above) looking pensive and detached is probably the most interesting of the group. A close second goes to Brienne looking particularly worried.

The new photos do not feature Greyjoys, Melisandre, Missandei, or dragons. Make what you will of that.

Can we talk about the fact that out of all the Stark’s Arya is the only one NOT being smothered by furs, it’s almost as if she’s only wearing her cloak as a statement rather than for warmth.

summary: “The stone is strong. The roots of the trees grow deep, and under the ground the Kings of Winter sit their thrones. So long as...
body: “The stone is strong. The roots of the trees grow deep, and under the ground the Kings of Winter sit their thrones. So long as those remained, Winterfell remained. It was not dead, just broken. Like me. I’m not dead either.”

summary: naturally, bc of your url i have to say bran stark! but also padme amidala 💕
question: naturally, bc of your url i have to say bran stark! but also padme amidala 💕
answer:
bran stark

  • favorite thing about them: he’s just such a sweet boy who’s been through so much,,, someone hug him
  • least favorite thing about them: this boy can be awkward af lmao, literally acts as if he has never been in a social situation in his life
  • favorite line: “old stories are like old friends. you have to visit them from time to time.”
  • brOTP: bran and jojen
  • OTP: bran and meera
  • nOTP: bran and daenerys?/ apparently that’s a thing 
  • random headcanon: modern!bran would definitely listen to a mixture of random folk music and also like heavy metal
  • unpopular opinion: JUSTICE FOR BRAN i’m waiting for his promo!! where the fuck is he?? did the show just like forget he existed?? come onnnnnn
  • song i associate with them: the devil within - digital daggers
  • favorite picture of them: (x)

padmé amidala

  • favorite thing about them: a woman!! in politics!! gorgeous!! love it
  • least favorite thing about them: ramasha don’t make me do this
  • favorite line: “i was not elected to watch my people suffer and die while you discuss this invasion in a committee!”
  • brOTP: padmé and sabé
  • OTP: padmé and anakin
  • nOTP: –
  • random headcanon: i love the idea of padmé raising luke and leia together as a happy little family asfklasldfksaf
  • unpopular opinion: i do find it incredibly weird in the movies how we see her and anakin when he’s so young and then he gets old and hot and they fall in love like,, idk if i saw some boy when he was 5 idk if i could get that image out of my head long enough to have sex with him
  • song i associate with them: bulletproof - la roux
  • favorite picture of them: (x)

.・゜゜・　send me a character　・゜゜・．
